subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Tal’s Hill at Minute Maid Park, an embankment in center field that has been the site of spectacular catches and comical tumbles alike, will be removed after this season.
snippet: Tal’s Hill at Minute Maid Park, an embankment in center field that has been the site of spectacular catches and comical tumbles alike, will be removed after this season.
